boardgame.name: Apotheca
boardgame.description: Players craft potions in a secret marketplace. Hide ingredients to deceive opponents, and use magical powers to mix concoctions. But beware - your opponents are brewing schemes of their own!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Apotheca is played on a 4x4 grid. Players gain points by making matches of three potions of the same color in a row. The first player to make three matches wins. It's easily learned, but the combination of asymmetric powers and secret facedown potions make the game a delicious challenge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On each turn, players take 2 of 4 possible actions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Reveal: Reveal a secret potion and gain a gem of that color_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Restock: Draw, look at, and place secret potions on the board until there are exactly 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Power: Use one of your active apothecary powers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Hire: Spend gems to hire new apothecaries_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whenever a player makes a match, they must place it on one of their apothecaries. This removes that apothecary's power for the rest of the game, so it's important for players to keep revealing potions, collecting gems and hiring new apothecaries... all while keeping their opponents at bay!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Deduction is key to Apotheca. Players trap each other with clever spatial moves, bluffing and misdirection. The action economy is very well balanced, so every turn offers an opportunity for strategy and tough decisions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The feeling of the game differs with every number of players:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 player is the most cerebral and controlled_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3 player is the most chaotic, yet still within your grasp_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 player is played in teams, offering neat collaborative gameplay_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This is for one copy of the Kickstarter Edition of Apothem with all stretch goals from the Kickstarter campaign including: Exploding Potion (red) - when revealed, shuffle an adjacent potion into the potion deck. (KS Exclusive) Peeker Potion (yellow) - when revealed, turn all secret potions towards you (so you can peek at _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;em!). (KS Exclusive) Cloning Potion (blue) - when revealed, place a facedown potion. **KS edition** Opened but never played. All components complete and in great condition. Image available upon request. Flat shipping fee $13 for Continental USA. Free shipping with purchase of $150+. Combined shipping available. Also available for pick up in NYC. I accept Paypal, Venmo, Google wallet and Chase Quickpay. Price is negotiable if you buy multiple games. I will consider international shipping if USPS can ship to the country. The rate would be based on the flat rate packages on USPS website (plus $3 to buy insurance if the value is bigger than $50). Shipping to China is $9/lb.
*For menmemeeps, purchased through Tennessee Game Days XIII (2018) Virtual Flea Market. Please do not purchase if you did not win.
